name: Rise to Valhalla
description:
Rise to Valhalla was one of the first 2D Platformer games I've made. I personally love Norse Mythology and decided to create this game around a spirit who is on an adventure to Valhalla and has to climb his way through each realm which is governed by gods like Odin, Thor, Freya etc.

The game was made for a second-year project. We were only given the requirement of two levels but with time I did feel like I could make this game a lot better and more entertaining.  I may come back to it and fix it up when I find the time. 

NB:

The sound option does not work and on launch, the game is quite loud. The only way to turn the game down is through sound options in the windows tab.
